title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the SmartContractAnalyzer tool, including the types of smart contracts to be analyzed, the legal compliance standards to be checked, and the potential vulnerabilities to be identified.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the SmartContractAnalyzer tool, including the components, their interactions, and the data flow.

title: Develop Smart Contract Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core analysis engine that can parse and analyze smart contract code for legal compliance and vulnerabilities.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface for the SmartContractAnalyzer tool, allowing users to upload smart contracts, view analysis results, and configure analysis settings.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the SmartContractAnalyzer tool.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the SmartContractAnalyzer tool, covering unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a thorough security audit of the SmartContractAnalyzer tool to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the SmartContractAnalyzer tool, including user guides, developer guides, and API documentation.
